Package nzilbb.ag.automation.util

Class AnnotatorWebApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • nzilbb.util.CommandLineProgram
      • nzilbb.webapp.StandAloneWebApp
        • nzilbb.ag.automation.util.AnnotatorWebApp
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigApp, ExtApp, TaskApp
    public class AnnotatorWebApp
extends StandAloneWebApp
    Base class for collecting together common functionality of Annatotor web app utilities.

      • init

        public void init()
          throws ClassNotFoundException,
                 NoSuchMethodException,
                 InvocationTargetException,
                 IllegalAccessException,
                 InstantiationException,
                 ClassCastException,
                 IOException,
                 SQLException
        Initialize the application.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If the implemenation for annotatorName cannot be found.
        NoSuchMethodException - If the annotator has no default constructor.
        IllegalAccessException - If the annotator's default constructor is not public.
        InvocationTargetException - If the annotator's constructor throws an exception.
        InstantiationException - If the annotator is an abstract class.
        ClassCastException - If the annotator does not extend Annotator.
        IOException - If the annotator jar file cannot be opened.
        SQLException

      • setFinishedPath

        public StandAloneWebApp setFinishedPath​(String newFinishedPath)
        Override this setter so it's not required as a command line switch
        Overrides:
        setFinishedPath in class StandAloneWebApp
        Parameters:
        newFinishedPath - The URI path (excluding leading '/') for the request that terminates the web app. Default is "finished".
